oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Liposome stabilized retinal schiff-bases
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: DAS, J
SINGH, AK
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: bacteriorhodopsin
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: All-trans-N-retinylidene-n-butylamine (3) can be stabilised in liposomes of phosphatidylcholine. The rate of formation of the Schiff base is found to decrease with increasing cholesterol concentration in the membrane.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: INDIAN JOURNAL OF CHEMISTRY SECTION B-ORGANIC CHEMISTRY INCLUDING MEDICINAL CHEMISTRY,33(7)615-617
